data.message: sorry facebook but few day already my facebook messenger cant load all my old history chat even at phone also at the computer he just keep loading and dint show up any chat at the phone app it write something went wrong. please try again

replies.message: Hi Benny. Can you please report the problems you are having with Messenger by following these steps in the Help Center: http://bit.ly/2xmyWmn? -Stephanie
already report 2 time and no even app the webpage facebook also is the same
Hi Benny. Thanks for reporting your issue to us. Due to the volume of reports we receive, it may take us some time to get to yours. We appreciate your patience! -Stephanie

Hello, I also experience the same for 6 days now. I have sent reports many times, opened a topic in help center and most of the people even my friends are experiencing this issue. Is there anyway Facebook can fix this?

I tried to resolve this issue on my own but I just faced a dead end.

My NewsFeed hasn't worked for 4 days.  Had this problem last month and it was almost 10 days before it got fixed.  Very frustrating and Facebook doesn't seem to care!  I have sent messages every day this week and get NO response.

Hi Debbie. 

Please use the “Report a Problem” link on your account to let us know more about what you're seeing.  

Learn how in the Help Center:

http://bit.ly/2xUvhxR

Thanks. -Chelsey
